channel.title: Softwares on Oliver Weissbarth
channel.description: Recent content in Softwares on Oliver Weissbarth

item.title: BookGen
item.description: Download BookGen is a free book-generation addon for the open-source 3D-package Blender. It allows you to fill shelves or create stacks of books – fast and easily. BookGen 1.0.0 is only compatible with Blender versions higher than 2.80. An older version that is compatible with Blender 2.

item.title: ImReveal
item.description: A bit of js to show the “before and after” of two images window.onload = function(){ im = new imReveal(document.getElementById("demo")) } Usage Simply include the imReveal js and css files into your page. Your two image should be wrapped by a container.
